title.rendered: Macallan Double Cask 30 Year Old 2021 Release

excerpt.rendered:
A distinguished single malt matured exclusively for 30 years in specially selected European and American oak sherry seasoned casks, the Macallan Double Cask 30 Years Old is a harmonious, well rounded single malt whisky, with a warm character.

Aroma: Fresh honeycomb, sweet toffee, red apple, fig and vanilla pod.
Palate: A smooth melody of cinnamon, ginger, Madagascan vanilla, dried fruits and oak.
Finish: Sweet oak, soft spice and toffee

Bottle size : 700
Distillery : Macallan
Age : 30
Vintage : 
ABV : 43.00%
